document.full_text: sustained gunfire rang out near libyan leader muammar gaddafi's heavily fortified compound in tripoli on friday and residents said they saw snipers on rooftops and pools of blood on the streets.
document.title: gunfire in tripoli near gaddafi's compound
lines_and_colors: sustained gunfire rang out near libyan leader muammar gaddafi's heavily fortified compound in tripoli on friday and residents said they saw snipers on rooftops and pools of blood on the streets.
